image_requirements.description: Required in order below (4 images): 1. Hero (Main) Image: Laydown imagery of items in pack. 2. 1st Alternate: Items in packaging. 3. 2nd Alternate: Front facing, cropped above lip to above belly button (of one color). 4. 3rd Alternate: Back facing, cropped in to garment.

Required in order below (3 images): 1. Hero (Main) Image: Laydown imagery that depicts number of items in pack. 2. 1st Alternate: Front facing, cropped above lip to above belly button (of one color). 3. 2nd Alternate: Back facing, cropped in to garment.

summary: This page outlines the photo direction guidelines for photographing Women's Intimates, specifically Bra Multipacks, detailing the required images with and without packaging.
